FuncDef: The display ipsec sa-expire statistics command displays the SA expiry information statistics.
CLIs: display ipsec sa-expire statistics [ slot <slot-number> [ engine <engine-id> | card <card-id> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Indicates the engine ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 1.

Indicates the card ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 1.

ExtraInfo: You can view the SA expiry status of IKE packets sent to IPSec.
